name: Plate IQ
headline: Automated Accounts Payable
description:
Plate IQ makes accounts payable simple.

Automated accounts payable software replaces manual data entry by digitizing your invoices down to the line item, automatically assigning them your proper GL codes, syncing the information to your accounting software, and providing analytics around purchasing. Plate IQ also offers one-click bill pay, inventory, and cloud-based data storage that allows businesses to go paperless.

founders.name: Ram Jayaraman, Founder/CTO
founders.description: Co-Founder/Tech dude at Automatic Labs ( YC S11 ), Plate IQ ( YC S15 ). I also angel invest occasionally.

# AP AUTOMATION AI
## Don’t JustAutomate AP. Ottimate It.
A smarter way for AP managers, approvers, controllers and CFOs to work through the entire invoice lifecycle.
[Meet Ottimate](https://plateiq.com/</meet-otimate/>)
![Ottimate winter 2024 g2 badges collage](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/Winter-G2-badges-1-829x1024.webp)
![](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/holiday-inn_white-logo-145x150.png) ![cava logo](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/cava-logo-150x55.png) ![tfk logo](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/TFK-white-150x22.png) ![w hotels logo](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/w-hotels-2-150x127.png) ![flores logo](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/flores-logo-150x57.png) ![gap logo](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/193-1936628_gap-logo-logo-150x124.png) ![](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Foodtown.png)
## Ottimate’s Always Talking With Your ERP
Never backfill your accounting or AP system again. With deep integration capabilities, detailed mapping, and source documentation links, Ottimate keeps everything up-to-date in both directions.
[**Explore top integrations**](https://plateiq.com/<https:/ottimate.com/industry/>)
![Detailed GL Mapping](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Detailed-GL-Mapping.svg)
### **Detailed GL Mapping**
Ottimate captures custom header and line item fields, then codes it all to multiple dimensions on your GL with zero to minimal training requirements.
![Deep Learning](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Deep-Learning.svg)
### **Deep** **Learning AI**
The Ottimate AI gets to know your unique AP set up, remembers how items are coded, and helps you optimize your spend over time.
![Links to Source](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/LinkstoSource.svg)
### **Links to Source Documentation**
Ottimate source documentation is always one click away in your accounting system of choice.
![Software System](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Software-system.svg)
### **Syncs with Any Software System**
Ottimate works with hundreds of accounting systems, including QuickBooks, NetSuite, Sage Intacct, and more.

## AI That Understands Your Invoices
**Inconsistent formats. Unfamiliar abbreviations. Line item details.**
Ottimate extracts, categorizes and three-way matches it all to your general ledger.
**[Spend 80% less time on your invoices](https://plateiq.com/<https:/ottimate.com/feature/invoice-automation/>)**
## Workaround-Free Approvals
**Don’t settle to work any other way but yours.**
Ottimate instantly routes invoices through a custom approval workflow based on your line-item rules, no matter how complex.
[**How Ottimate learns your workflows**](https://plateiq.com/<https:/ottimate.com/feature/invoice-automation/>)
![](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Workaround.png)

![](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/ai-powered-payment.svg)
## Your AI-Powered Payment Partner
**Approve and schedule payments via check, ACH or virtual card – in a single click.**
While you’re at it, Ottimate will dig for discrepancies, monitor for missing invoices, and share real-time spend visibility, so you can make fast and informed decisions.
[**Cross vendor payments off your to-do list**](https://plateiq.com/<https:/ottimate.com/feature/vendorpay/>)
## AP That Pays You Back
**Paying bills won’t grow your bottom line – unless you Ottimate your payments.**
Boost cash flow by capitalizing on vendor-sponsored early payment discounts, eliminating unapproved invoice spend, and earning cash back with a virtual card.
[**Control spend with a virtual card**](https://plateiq.com/<https:/ottimate.com/feature/vendorpay/>)
![](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/vendor-pay.svg)
## See How Tender Greens Scaled Operations by Automating Invoice Processing
“When I started at Tender Greens, our AP department had three people. Today, even as our business grew from 17 to 24 locations, Ottimate has cut our bookkeeping costs in half — and allowed us to move forward with an AP team of just one employee.”
**Sean Skuro**
VP of Finance and Accounting, Tender Greens
[Read Their Story](https://plateiq.com/</customer/tender-greens/>)
## End-to-End AI for a Better Day-to-Day
All companies have to do AP, but no single AP process is the same. Ottimate fits into your team’s unique dynamic – and works overtime so you don’t have to.
[Meet Ottimate Today](https://plateiq.com/</meet-otimate/>)

# AP AUTOMATION AI
## Don’t JustAutomate AP. Ottimate It.
A smarter way for AP managers, approvers, controllers and CFOs to work through the entire invoice lifecycle.
Meet Ottimate⟨64⟩
![Ottimate winter 2024 g2 badges collage⟨65⟩]
![](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/holiday-inn_white-logo-145x150.png) ![cava logo⟨66⟩] ![tfk logo⟨67⟩] ![w hotels logo⟨68⟩] ![flores logo⟨69⟩] ![gap logo⟨70⟩] ![](https://ottimate.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Foodtown.png)
## Ottimate’s Always Talking With Your ERP
Never backfill your accounting or AP system again. With deep integration capabilities, detailed mapping, and source documentation links, Ottimate keeps everything up-to-date in both directions.
**Explore top integrations**⟨71⟩
![Detailed GL Mapping⟨72⟩]
### **Detailed GL Mapping**
Ottimate captures custom header and line item fields, then codes it all to multiple dimensions on your GL with zero to minimal training requirements.
![Deep Learning⟨73⟩]
### **Deep** **Learning AI**
The Ottimate AI gets to know your unique AP set up, remembers how items are coded, and helps you optimize your spend over time.
![Links to Source⟨74⟩]
### **Links to Source Documentation**
Ottimate source documentation is always one click away in your accounting system of choice.
![Software System⟨75⟩]
### **Syncs with Any Software System**
Ottimate works with hundreds of accounting systems, including QuickBooks, NetSuite, Sage Intacct, and more.

## AI That Understands Your Invoices
**Inconsistent formats. Unfamiliar abbreviations. Line item details.**
Ottimate extracts, categorizes and three-way matches it all to your general ledger.
**Spend 80% less time on your invoices⟨79⟩**

**Don’t settle to work any other way but yours.**
Ottimate instantly routes invoices through a custom approval workflow based on your line-item rules, no matter how complex.

## Your AI-Powered Payment Partner
**Approve and schedule payments via check, ACH or virtual card – in a single click.**
While you’re at it, Ottimate will dig for discrepancies, monitor for missing invoices, and share real-time spend visibility, so you can make fast and informed decisions.
**Cross vendor payments off your to-do list**⟨80⟩

**Paying bills won’t grow your bottom line – unless you Ottimate your payments.**
Boost cash flow by capitalizing on vendor-sponsored early payment discounts, eliminating unapproved invoice spend, and earning cash back with a virtual card.

generated_description:
**Plate IQ Overview: Automated Accounts Payable**

Founded in 2015 as part of Y Combinator's Batch S15, Plate IQ is a New York-based company on a mission to simplify accounts payable (AP) through automation. With a team of around 200 employees, they developed a cloud-based software that takes the headache out of AP by digitizing invoices down to individual line items. This means no more manual data entry—forget about it!

### What They Do:

Plate IQ’s software streamlines the entire AP process by automating invoice handling from capture to approval and payment. It does this by:
- **Digitization**: Transforming paper invoices into digital formats, ready for immediate processing.
- **Automatic GL Coding**: Assigning general ledger codes to expenses automatically, reducing the chance of human error.
- **Integration**: Seamlessly syncing data with major accounting platforms like QuickBooks and NetSuite.
- **Analytics**: Providing valuable insights around purchasing, so businesses can optimize spending.
- **One-Click Bill Pay**: Making payments effortless, helping businesses manage expenses with speed and efficiency.
- **Cloud-Based Storage**: This allows companies to operate paperlessly and retain all invoice records securely online.

### Why It Matters:

In a world where time is money, Plate IQ helps businesses save both. The software is designed to cut down the administrative burden of AP, allowing finance teams to focus on high-level strategic decision-making rather than getting bogged down in repetitive tasks. 

### Target Audience:

Plate IQ caters to a variety of industries including hospitality, retail, healthcare, construction, and more. They specifically address the needs of roles such as AP managers, CFOs, and controllers, providing custom solutions that fit the unique workflows of each position.

### Recognition and Future:

Their innovative approach to accounts payable has not gone unnoticed, garnering attention within the fintech space. By attending events like NGA 2025, Plate IQ aims to further establish itself as a leader in AP automation.

For more information about Plate IQ and their offerings, visit their website: [plateiq.com](https://plateiq.com/). 

In summary, Plate IQ is not just about automation; it’s about transforming how businesses handle accounts payable—making it not only simpler but smarter. As they continue to evolve, their commitment to efficiency and integration promises to pave the way for a future where financial tasks are quick, accurate, and less of a hassle.
